document.full_text: an accused serial burglar and thief dubbed the "barefoot bandit" narrowly escaped capture at least twice during his two years on the run, once telling police chasing him, "you can't catch me," according to newly filed court documents.
document.title: latest "barefoot bandit" charges chart brushes with law
lines_and_colors: an accused serial burglar and thief dubbed the "barefoot bandit" narrowly escaped capture at least twice during his two years on the run, once telling police chasing him, "you can't catch me," according to newly filed court documents.
